original_text: And they took Absalom and threw him into a great pit in the forest and raised over him a very great heap of stones. And all Israel fled every one to his own home.
korean_text: 그들이 압살롬을 옮겨다가 수풀 가운데 큰 구멍에 그를 던지고 그 위에 매우 큰 돌무더기를 쌓으니라 온 이스라엘 무리가 각기 장막으로 도망하니라

sentences.original_text: and threw him into a great pit in the forest
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 숲속의 큰 구덩이에 던져 넣고

sentences.original_text: and raised over him a very great heap of stones.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 위에 아주 큰 돌무더기를 쌓았다.

sentences.original_text: every one to his own home.
